news.title: Wall Street braced for a private credit meltdown. The risk of one is rising
news.summary: Private credit is expected to grow from $3.4 trillion in 2025 to an estimated $4.9 trillion by 2029. Wall Street is starting to raise alarms about the risks.

news.title: What obesity drugmakers see next in the market: More pills, easier access and drug combinations
news.summary: CNBC spoke to executives from Eli Lilly, Novo Nordisk, Pfizer and other drugmakers at the annual JPMorgan Healthcare Conference in San Francisco.

news.title: Trump withdraws 'Board of Peace' invitation to Carney in widening rift with Canada
news.summary: Trump withdraws invitation to Canada to join the new Board of Peace. Carney warned against economic coercion by superpowers. Trump said he has withdrawn the invitation.

news.title: Capital One is buying startup Brex for $5.15 billion in credit card firm's latest deal
news.summary: Capital One's acquisition of Brex is the latest deal under Rich Fairbank. Fairbank is a rare founder-CEO of a major U.S. bank.

news.title: House passes final funding bills 8 days before shutdown, Senate now will consider
news.summary: The Senate will still have to pass the measures when it returns to Washington next week. The Senate is expected to take up the bills when it reconvenes on Monday.

news.title: The case for a U.S. bear market was building even before Trump antagonized overseas investors
news.summary: There are two important measures that point to a downturn for stocks, according to Longview Economics. The measures are the S&P 500 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average.

news.title: Gold is approaching $5,000, and ‘unavoidable uncertainty’ means it could go higher
news.summary: RBC’s head of commodities says there could be paths even higher for gold in a “real risk-off scenario”

news.title: ‘It’s my money’: My $800K inheritance is paying for a $1.6 million house. Shouldn’t I decide where my husband and I live?
news.summary: ‘My husband and I have been together for 25 years. We have two children’ ‘I’m so proud of my husband. He’s the best husband in the world.’

news.title: Nvidia’s on-and-off China relationship appears to be on again
news.summary: China's government has given the go-ahead to big companies including Alibaba to buy the U.S. semiconductor maker’s chips.

news.title: Natural gas prices have overshot as deep freeze hits the U.S., says Goldman
news.summary: Goldman Sachs thinks the current natural gas price reflects a temporary imbalance and should eventually correct. Goldman Sachs says the current price is too high for natural gas to be profitable.
